segments.advisor_message: So, can you tell me a bit about your current home situation? Are you renting or do you own it?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, so I, uh, I actually own it now but it's been a bit, um, complicated with like the move n’ everything. Just got here, um, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And what's the address of the property? Just the basics will help.
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, right! It's, uh, 123 Elm St, but I think it’s in Springfield, zip code, uh, 62704. I haven't really settled in yet, y'know?
